: A snail who won the race by using a special type of fuel that allowed it to move at incredible speeds.
Miracle: A snail who won the race due to a sudden burst of energy and speed that came out of nowhere.
Strategy: A snail who won the race by using its intelligence and strategic thinking to outsmart its competitors.
Luck: A snail who won the race due to a series of lucky events that allowed it to get ahead of its opponents.
Cheat: A snail who won the race by using illegal or unethical methods to gain an advantage over its competitors.
